scripts.build: sh -c "node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js main.js -s _ -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -o ../../assets/js/translate.js && node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs ../../assets/js/translate.js --compress --mangle -o ../../assets/js/translate.min.js --source-map \"url='/static/js/translate.min.js.map'\"" && sed -i s!../../assets!/static! ../../assets/js/translate.min.js.map
